Description.Text: Hotel Cresta Sun is a friendly 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Davos. Highlights include onsite dining, an indoor swimming pool, sauna and a good location next to Golf Club Davos. Davos is a charming town located on the Landwasser river in the Swiss Alps. Nearby places of interest include the Kirchner Museum and the Forest Cemetery. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular regional destinations. The hotel occupies a modern building with wood-fronted balconies and a garden. Facilities include a heated indoor swimming pool, sauna and table tennis. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are simply decorated with warm tones and wood furniture. Amenities include satellite TV, a mini-bar, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. The hotel restaurant serves a creative menu in a relaxing open-plan setting, whilst guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite.
